metadata.title: CVE-2016-9918 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description: In BlueZ 5.42, an out-of-bounds read was identified in "packet_hexdump" function in "monitor/packet.c" source file. This issue can be triggered by processing a corrupted dump file and will result in btmon crash.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-02-07, appears unfixed crash in hcidump command line tool only

criterions.comment: bluez package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
